name: Symbian
short_description:
Symbian OS using CMake as a build system. Lets you build and run Symbian emulator on Microsoft Windows using CMake. This project is based on the latest S^3 source code from the Symbian Foundation before its transition to a licensing body. 

 We are aiming at running the core of Symbian OS on a host operating system. Currently only supporting Microsoft Windows. Long term we would like to support Android and iOS. Here is a non exhaustive list of the Symbian OS features we support:

Leave/Trap
Threading 
Descriptors 
User library 
File System 
Stores 

Mercurial repository:
​http://hg.slions.net/symbian
summary: Symbian using CMake as build system
